reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's soft velvety fabric and find it comfortable and flattering on the body.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress!
items.body: This dress is gorgeous and a perfect fit! It was such a great find for a fall wedding! Read more
items.author: Susie Keys

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely fabric
items.body: Beautiful dress, fits true to size. Read more
items.author: DariaMuller

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for all different types of occasions
items.body: So pretty and flattering. I wore this dress for a fall wedding and it was perfect. 5’6 143 Lbs ordered a size medium. Read more
items.author: Savannah

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like the fit of this dress!
items.body: Pretty color and nice fit. Fast shipping nice dress for wedding or graduation thank you. Read more
items.author: Dee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning!
items.body: Stunning! Wore this for a few Christmas events and received so many compliments. Fits true to size. Read more
items.author: robert m.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Curvy girl approved!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I love, LOVE this dress! The royal blue color was gorgeous for a wedding. The fit was very flattering for my body. It moved well for dancing everything from the Macarena to the Electric Slide to slow dancing. The slit allowed for freedom of movement. My daughter took a little video of my husband and I slow dancing, and you can see how the dress just sways and flows. It feels amazing on and was both warm enough for a fall wedding and cool enough to not burn me up during the dancing. I didn’t even bother with wearing body shapewear under it since it just draped over my body so nicely. Plus, there was no concern about a panty line or anything else showing as the material was thick and laid smoothly on all my, ahem, curves. I’m heavier in the torso and bust, and it fit me like a dream. At 5’5” and 190 pounds, I went for the XL and was glad I went on the higher end of my size for comfort. It fits true to size. Without shoes it still didn’t drag the floor, so the length is also excellent. It looked like I had it tailored to me. Absolutely can’t recommend this dress enough! Read more
items.author: Frenzied Mom

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Dress, High Slit, Stained Blue
items.body: Super pretty, great for the holidays. Only complaints are that the slit is too high if you're a garment girlie (iykyk) and it stained my armpits and underclothing blue. Read more
items.author: cat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit perfectly, very flattering
items.body: I don’t usually have good luck shopping on line. Nothing ever feels or looks great on me in my opinion. This dress is super comfortable and I love how it looks! My sister tried it on and it looks great on her too! I’m 5’8” and she’s 5’3” so that’s saying a lot! Read more
items.author: Derek Coulter

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal Short Sleeve Cocktail V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal Short Sleeve Cocktail V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: #Burnout-rust, #Velvet-burgundy, #Burnout-army Green, #Velvet-green, #Burnout-dark Blue, #Velvet-burnt Orange, #Velvet-navy Blue, #Burnout-black, #Burnout-green, #Burnout-dusty Blue, #Velvet-teal Blue, #Burnout-burgundy, #Velvet-black, #Velvet-dusty Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
